text: Józefa Maria Hennelowa (1 April 1925 - 22 August 2020) was a Polish publicist, journalist and politician. She was born in Wilno, Poland (now Vilnius, Lithuania). As a journalist, she worked for Tygodnik Powszechny. Hennelowa was a member of the Sejm from 1989 to 1993. Hennelowa died in Krakow, Poland on 22 August 2020, aged 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Polish politicians Category:Politicians from Vilnius
title: Józefa Hennelowa
